nav.doubletap: Push back twice to exit app

btn.goto: go here with external maps app

location.nolocation: Location could not be retrieved (does app have location access?)
location.error: Error getting location (heeft de app toestemming?)

config.crashInfo: Enable collecting crash information (helps us fix bugs!)
config.analyticsInfo: Enable collecting analytics (no personal info is stored)
config.downloadAll: Download all files & routes (not necessery, but convenient when you have limited or no mobile internet)
config.help: Here you can toggle settings, and download routes to your phone.

message.englishNotYetSupportedMessage: Our apologies, only parts of the app are translated. We are working on a better support for English. Please reach out to us if you'd like a translation in a different language.

ios.info.plist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Find your current location to see interesting points nearby.
ios.info.plist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Find your current location to see interesting points nearby.
